description: This course will provide an examination of technology and its impact on medicine, with an emphasis on the intersection of engineering with medicine and health. Basic foundations of historical perspective, constraints on technological development, and the promise and peril of technological impact on medicine will be discussed. Modules will also focus on specific technological advances as a basis for the discussion. Planned topics include: implants with emphasis on cochlear devices and sensory rehabilitative devices. Reading will integrate topics of the impact of technology on medicine, as well as examine societal issues related to effects technology in health care.
name: TECH & ENG IN MEDICINE
